snippet.title: Arcane Revolt - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Arcane Revolt is an narrative and dialogue focused action RPG set in a medieval fantasy world where players lead a revolution as a powerful mage. 

As the protagonist, you will navigate through a realm filled with ruthless tyranny, ancient magic, and political intrigue.

Arcane Revolt offers an immersive experience with engaging and diverse dialogue options, allowing players to shape their own unique story.

✔️Wishlist Arcane Revolt ➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2390910/Arcane_Revolt/ 

✦ Discord ➤ https://discord.gg/uAxWJDVG9u
✦ Twitter ➤ https://twitter.com/MoonflakeStudio

✦ Itch.io ➤ https://moonflake-studio.itch.io/
